This folder contains the ArcSWAT US STATSGO soils database. The database consists of an ArcGIS geodatabase
(SWAT_US_Soils.mdb) and the associated raster folder (SWAT_US_Soils.idb). These contents must be placed directly
in the ArcSWAT Databases folder (e.g., C:\Program Files\ArcSWAT\Databases\). This will result in the following 
and folders:

1.) C:\Program Files\ArcSWAT\Databases\SWAT_US_Soils.mdb
2.) C:\Program Files\ArcSWAT\Databases\SWAT_US_Soils.idb\

Failure to properly place the US Soils files in the above locations will result in errors when attempting to
access the data within the ArcSWAT interface.
